website_summaries.verdict: If you need to store liquids in the fridge or take them on the go, you won't be disappointed with this set.
pros: Boasts a sleek design and spacious 470 milliliter capacity
Lids seal airtight and prevent leaks
cons: They feel a bit thin, especially when compared to older Tupperware tumblers- but they still provide reliable storage

customer_reviews.title: As good as 25 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have these same glasses that I have had for over 25 years and I read reviews before I bought these that said they were flimsy and weren't any good but this set is every bit as good as my first set and I use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Vachula

customer_reviews.title: Retro kitchen glasses
customer_reviews.text: There was a time when every kitchen had these tumblers, I grew up with them. They're the perfect size and having a truly leak proof lid is invaluable. If I can't finish my drink, I'll pop it in the fridge and know it won't fall over and spill everywhere and it also won't absorb the refrigerator taste.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Cups!
customer_reviews.text: Just like my old ones, but not faded or dinged up. Like that the lids fit tight. No spill worries. Love the new colors. My old set is sea-sick green, faded yellow, dingy white ... .it was time to say goodbye. Love that these fit in my car cup-holder. I'm glad they are stiff and don't cave-in, and the lids stay on if you have to give them a squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Maeshawn

customer_reviews.title: Old School Look
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my morning smoothies. It transports easily from home to work. I can even lay it down horizontally in my lunch bag without the fear of leaks. It is just like the Tupperware my mom had when I was a child. It's an old school product, for a new school world.
customer_reviews.author: Deus Ex Machina

customer_reviews.title: Love these! My mom had tupperware while I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My mom had tupperware while I was growing up so I had to get some for myself. These are exactly the size that is stated and large enough for my husband and me. I will have to get more of various kinds. Arrived quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love these Tupperware glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these Tupperware glasses. We are empty nesters and I still make sauces like we were a family of four. These were the solution. A bit pricey but worth it for me. Groceries are too expensive to waste the sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sized tumblers for kids or someone looking for something unbreakable and leak proof. The cap keeps the drink from spilling out, and it also works quite well with the Tupperware sippy cup lids if you want to use them for children or people with difficulty drinking without spilling. I will buy more (and more sippy lids -- sold separately).
customer_reviews.author: AntKathy

customer_reviews.title: I love that they come with one of the toughest kids ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest cups EVER! They take me back to when I was young but they come in so hand now. I love that they come with one of the toughest kids I've ever seen. While I have a bit of a struggle taking the tops on and off they are great for traveling! I know we will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Like It Used To Be...........
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that these cups are not only small, they are also made of cheap plastic. The lids work well. However, Tupperware cups like this used to hold a lot more and were made of a hard, durable lifetime plastic. Not any more. My first purchase of Tupperware in about 20 years and last.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Love !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Look just like the picture ... and are 100% leak proof. I use these to store smoothies ... and they are the best. I stick them in my purse ... and they’ve never leaked , nor has the lid come off. Love these cups !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these primarily to use for shaking up our All One (great product- check it out!) the colors are really cheerful and the cups are perfect with reliable closure of lids. had one last me over ten years! Tupperware is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ethereal Veery

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers are just like the ones from my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: kay dee

customer_reviews.title: Good for a life time.
customer_reviews.text: The same as it was 50 - 60 years ago and dependable. I expect to die and it will still be good in 120 years. Have some cups like this the 60s. They are still like new.
customer_reviews.author: trubadore

customer_reviews.title: Nice and inexpensive only issue is when I purchase them ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and inexpensive only issue is when I purchase them it stated it was 12 oz and it's not, it is 16 oz and I had already purchased from another buyer 16oz so now I'm stuck with two sets of 16 oz and no 12 oz tumblers with lids like originally wanted when I purchased these now all I will need to look at 12 ounces again
customer_reviews.author: Lizoringa

customer_reviews.title: Good old brand
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful from actual Tupperware brand. A bit expensive for only four cups but Tupperware brand is and is supposed to be lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: They don't leak.
customer_reviews.text: Not a jumbo cup. I expected bigger not paying attention to specific size. However, I have found them useful for work with the lid. They don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly parker

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say they are Tupperware. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Reeder

customer_reviews.title: DON’T LEND OUT YOUR TUPPERWARE
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Tupperware when I was little. As time went by so did most of my mother’s Tupperware sets. If family member want to take home your tasty foods, use paper plates with foil on top.. I love my leak proof cups, definitely will by more Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Reakerl R.

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware will last you FOREVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tupperware, and this product!! use them daily and they hold up well!! I put them in the dishwasher daily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cups!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cups to use at work and keep in my locker because of the lids. These great i absolutely loved them. Thought they would of been a but bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: Ayisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these, perfect for when the grandkids are here. The colors are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wyatt-Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: I have loved Tupperware since I was a kid. These brought back so many great memories. The product itself is great because it has a lid so good for the car. The cups sweat a lot so a koozie may be my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware Jumbo Tumblers
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers are a great value. They are durable and will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Locke

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Gin and Tonics on the patio. Don’t want glass on the patio, and was happy to see these were still made.😀
customer_reviews.author: HHIvy

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Style 16 oz Tupperware Tumblers
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups! I have severe carpal tunnel, and the size of the tumblers is perfect for me to hold without causing me to have stress on my wrists! I’ve looked for these for a long time, and finally found them here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Durkin

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: What’s summertime without Tupperware glasses. Our 1st set lasted 40 years and kids ask for them when visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Sueg

customer_reviews.title: Just like my old ones!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for ones like this for a long time. My old ones eventually got so the lids didn't fit so well (probably. I washed them in the dishwasher too many times over 30 years or so!). Delighted to have these. My husband is now in a wheel chair and I needed cups with lids that he can get out of the refrigerator and get to the table without spilling or leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Always excellent quality. Long time product. Our use it to carry extra beverages around. As I do my errands daily.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: Perfect .. !! Love the lids. Great in dishwasher. Brilliant colors.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: They are just as sturdy as the older version. I put them in the dishwasher top rack and there are no problems. If you need a good sturdy cup with a spill proof lid this one is perfect, not too big and fits in my cup holders in both my new car and vintage jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a tight seal
customer_reviews.text: Who do doesn’t love Tupperware. I love it cause I can take my almond milk in it and my slim fast power in my smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: bella ragazza

customer_reviews.title: Slick sides.
customer_reviews.text: Not like old Tupperware from 80’s. Miss the textured sides.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific tumblers, use them everyday, fast ship, many thanks, highly recommend. A+ A+ A+ A+ A+
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Brings back memories
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a set of 35-year-old Tupperware tumblers, & I'm very pleased that they kept the same colors. Quite a difference from the ones we've had for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are not your Mama's Tupperware glasses. They are smaller, and flimsy. You can easily squeeze them out of round. The old ones were sturdier. One is leaking when shaken with the lid on. They are made in China, not in Florida. It's sad to see an American icon degraded. I will not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, just like the ones I had as a kid
customer_reviews.text: Punch a hole in the lid and you have a great kids cup...just add a straw!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made like they used to be made.
customer_reviews.text: They seemed to be cheaply made, not like I am used to from years ago..... but that seems to be the way so many things are made now . I bought them to make smoothies in and freeze.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware products
customer_reviews.text: Tumblers were just as advertised. After all these years the Tupperware products have not changed. They are still great.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: like the colors of these tumblers and are not flimsy.

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Tupperware is a wonderful product. I am glad I found it on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I use these tumblers to make protein shakes and they work like a charm. No leaking and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: These containers started leaking after using them for 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: These containers started leaking after using them for 2 months. I used other Tupperware products in the past but this one is not up to the standards of Tupperware at all.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive all lids
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from attached image, I received my order with only three lids. One of the three lids I did receive was wrong color. So in review, missing one lid and one lid wrong color.

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the glasses! I remember them from my childhood.

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: very happy with them, just took a long time to get them.
customer_reviews.author: zoe williams

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups they are amazing the lids fit perfect. Pictures did not do them justice. Tupperware is amazing and I can't believe how affordable these were.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colors were not as bright as the picture represented, but the cups were just what I needed.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for the set & the quality seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for the set & the quality seems to be just as good as the ones I've had for years.

customer_reviews.title: Best sealable cups
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a while for dependable cups with lids with a tight seal. These are 100% top quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are fine; I do wish they were the hard plastic though

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product

customer_reviews.title: Lids fit well.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I still have the old ones from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible.I still have the old ones from the 1980's and they are still like new and so much nicer and of very good quality.These are cheap quality and flimsy and ugly. Hate them.Tupperware and Avon have totally changed and gone downhill. I haven't seen enough of the other new tupperware to be sure if it is all bad. But Avon sure is.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gloshen

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware Tumblers Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to fine Tupperware on Amazon. It is perfect for use by my grandchildren and me as well. It also stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good Ole Tupperware!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tumblers to shake my protein powder & milk together. If I need to carry the drink with me, I don't have to worry about it spilling. The caps fit snug and seal well.
customer_reviews.author: FencePpl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still have my 40 year old set, just thought I would add some new color.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Williams

customer_reviews.title: They leak
customer_reviews.text: Thought that the Tupperware tumblers did not leak, but they do even though the lids fit very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. of Dover, Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are fine but it took a long time to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Lund

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why the 1 stars
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see how any of the 1 stars are correct. Looks high quality, dropped them a few times, no breaking, no spilling with lid on, I freeze smoothies in them with no problems! (But I am smart and fill it 2/3rds for expanding liquids) only “possible” complaint is I wish they were bigger like 16 oz or 20 oz, but that’s a different product and the issue is solved with this 12oz product by using two per day. And other “possible” complaint is the lids secure really, really tight. That said, no spilling! And this is just a high quality desired feature. Bottom line, 5 stars earned
customer_reviews.author: The L’s

customer_reviews.title: Second review
customer_reviews.text: Correcting my review just a tad. Lids didn't fit, no way could we get them on. Took another approach and dipped them in hot water like a mouth guard then got them on the tumbler. Just a tip for the next guy,,, not convenient and I hope they keep the shape so I don't have to do it each time they are used but for not it worked. Shouldn't have had to !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Field

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for protein shakes and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Got these for protein shakes. These tumblers eliminate the problem with getting expensive shakers completely clean. Exactly the right size for 12oz of liquid with a scoop of powder and room to shake. I received 4 colors with interchangeable lids that seal very well. I've used them for a few weeks, and have been so pleased that I'm ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just received these tumblers. Don't know how long they'll last, but we're satisfied enough to order another set. Lids are provided with this set. However, these are narrower than the 'old' 16 oz. tumblers. Lids from the 'old' 16 oz. tumblers are too large. Lids form the 'old' 12 oz. tumblers do fit.
customer_reviews.author: cjlfes

customer_reviews.title: drink cups
customer_reviews.text: These cups were just what I needed to make my diet drinks ahead of time. I had 3 from many, many years ago and were not sure if these were like the ones that I have; thank goodness that they were very close.
customer_reviews.author: barbie01

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: After breaking my 3rd glass in 2 weeks, I returned to the ever reliable Tupperware tumblers. They are pricey, but I'm glad they're still available. I may be clumsy & drop these tumblers, but no more broken glass to clean up. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful cups. have bought this set a few time
customer_reviews.text: wonderful cups. have bought this set a few time. my kids keep running off with mine when they come to visit. they are leakproof and they mix their protein drinks and take them with them before going to the gym.

customer_reviews.title: These are just like the old tupperware ones we used to have!!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the colors and the durability of the cups. The seals that came with them are nice for traveling, but they are not the tops for sipping out of, just so you know. We found those and ordered a set of them as well.

customer_reviews.title: Same quality Tupperware that we grew up with
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Tight fitting lids and the size of the tumbler ( tall and skinny) fits nicely in my hand. Same quality Tupperware as we grew up with.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the thick plastic tupperware like back in the days
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 star based on how thin these cups are. Nothing like the thick plastic tupperware like back in the days. The lids are nice for spill proof. The lids fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Quality shows
customer_reviews.text: The Tupperware quality shows in these, but they're also a bit expensive because they're Tupperware. Lids fit very tightly but can sometimes be a little hard to remove. Vibrant colors are nice.

customer_reviews.title: love Tupperwaree. We received tu[[erware for our wedding 25 ...

product_meta.title: TP-640-T212 Tupperware Jumbo Tumblers (Set of 4)
product_meta.description: All tupperware products are made from safe and non-toxic materials. The containers do not release any harmful chemicals in food or liquid contents. So every time you pack food for your loved ones, be rest assured that all you have packed is taste and love.
feature_bullets: Designed in bright and attractive colours, this set of four superior quality tumblers by tupperware is suitable for all age groups. Ideal for carrying water or other beverages to work or your favourite energy drink while exercising, these tumblers also help storing everyday liquid items in the fridge easily.
In bright colours suitable for all age groups. Air-tight and liquid-tight seal. Convenient size for perfect grip to hold in hand.

Tupperware products are made of non-toxic, 100 percent virgin food-grade plastic. Hence, you can easily rely on the quality of all tupperware products. This tupperware tumbler set includes four high-quality tumblers that are safe for you and your family. You can conveniently carry your favourite beverage to school or office in these tumblers.
Tupperware seek to minimise waste, energy use and greenhouse gases globally across all manufacturing processes by applying ‘reduce, reuse and recycle’ (3r) resource conservation program.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars394 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
